  • weekly picks (May 2 week 2022)
  • A WordCloud of 2022 May 2nd week collection

    1. science.abn6376 Anomalous fluid flow in quantum systems (Ballistic-superdiffution-diffusion, Science)

    2. science.abk2397 Quantum gas microscopy of Kardar-Parisi-Zhang superdiffusion (Science)

    3. science.abk2400 Observing emergent hydrodynamics in a long-range quantum magnet (Science)
